html:
8.5.21  5:10 am   how do you come up with the names of your characters like damien maymdien, person derpsom, joe tractorman, etc.? 

      sometimes i just have to :::imagine:::

8.5.21  5:03 am   how are you so cool 

      could be a reflection of you

8.5.21  3:53 am   Is it possible to buy money? 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.5.21  12:08 am   am i really free to do whatever i want to 

      more specific: you are free to DEPICT anything you want to in an artistic setting. UNLESS it contradicts popular viewpoints of present day society

8.4.21  10:46 pm   what are your thoughts on spirituality?

      it's like going to the store not to buy something but because you work there

8.4.21  10:31 pm   At any point in your music career, have their been times where everything was going so horrible for you that you just felt like dropping everything and cry.

     yes

     If so how did you overcome these situations 

      looking for fundamental ways to prevent the production departments from trying to suffocate the writing department. according to research, this is not only possible, but also probable, according to most laws of nature. big if true, my life would begin

8.4.21  9:08 pm   What are the chords during the first verse of might quit please? 

      E
      G#-7
      Asus2
      C#-7 B7sus4 B7us4
     E
     G#-7
     Asus2         B7sus4 B7sus4
     E

8.4.21  8:44 pm   do you think re-inventing the song production department will take as long as re-inventing the video department did?

      there was a slight renovation that took place, that's mostly all set. the next issue to look at, which i think is much more exciting, is how to prevent the production departments from trying to suffocate the writing department

8.4.21  6:24 pm   What did you mean when you said you were reinventing your machine(s)?

      right now i'm reinveinting my assumptions of what's possible

8.4.21  3:21 pm   what's your favorite thing?

      time

8.4.21  2:08 pm   will you be there at the inevitable heat death of the universe?

     where

     I hear there's gonna be a sick party

8.4.21  1:34 pm   what do you think of super mario brothers

      imagine 2 supercharged versions of what you would consider a typical mario brother

8.4.21  1:23 pm   i eat plain spinach while i write songs

      that makes sense

8.4.21  12:41 pm   is there a difference between music and sound?

     music is usually when a person is using sound to communicate, in a mostly hypnotic manner. music is therefore a subset of sound

     and is this important?

      that all depends on the day's events

8.4.21  12:39 pm   Why haven't you updated the reality section of your website since 2016?

      i think you've got the details a bit wrong. i didn't update it at all BEFORE 2016. which is exactly why i have so much catching up to do, in 2016 and after, still to this day

8.4.21  12:15 pm   what is your favourite word?

      dump truck

8.4.21  12:03 pm   a couple questions here, in "the moon is made of cheese but i cant taste it", when the turtles roll through the street, there is a pentagon with a hat, is he a turtle?

     i don't see why not

     is he the same pentagon as the one in "im best friends with my own front door"? or maybe a cousin or something?

     could be the same pentagonal shaped actor

     love both songs anyway, bye

8.4.21  10:55 am   How do I know when a song or a melody is good enough? 

      when you forget you wrote it and then you hear it and you like it

8.4.21  10:47 am   Are you a princess

      no, but i can see why you would think that

8.4.21  10:21 am   how to make good ideas

      there's almost no way of realizing until you've already done it

8.4.21  10:16 am   Are you depressed

      no

8.4.21  10:13 am   when your next piece of music coming out

      there is something of a renaissance coming up

8.4.21  9:36 am   what exactly is changing in the audio department? daw?
if yes,then which one are you switching to?

      i've added full scripting capability, which is a large blessing and only somewhat of a curse

8.4.21  7:37 am   If the camera was made to picture things then why the camera can't take a picture inside the camera

      then it would be too powerful

8.4.21  7:07 am   Is trying to find meaning in life/existence a waste of the limited time we have to live?

      no

8.4.21  6:24 am   i can't make any more good songs... do you recommend selling my soul to the devil so i could get my talent back?

      maybe just rent it out for a week. then see if you can gain some perspective from doing that

8.4.21  2:04 am   do you think working on songwriting will take as long as working on 3d did?

      songwriting never takes as long as production. songwriting is about 10 to 100x faster than production, in terms of how quickly it gets through the material. this is because i'm kind of an idiot and haven't figured out common sense yet

8.4.21  12:12 am   Will you be doing a video on velcro?

      velcro is best in purely audio form

8.3.21  9:27 pm   What's a song? 

      it's like when you have a message in a bottle but it explodes way outside of the bottle

8.3.21  8:44 pm   what should i be afraid of

      whether or not you are afraid of the correct thing

8.3.21  7:23 pm   what is on you to-list

      set up some ground rules

8.3.21  6:53 pm   bill i have my first day back to school soon please give me advice 

      first you must find the location of the school

8.3.21  5:00 pm   what are your favourite concepts?

      to and fro

8.3.21  4:43 pm   do you think someday you'll be able to visit the alternate universes where you produce slightly different versions of your things (or totally different things)

      yes

8.3.21  2:04 pm   why do people ask if you use autotune 

      it's an easy icebreaker question, when getting to know someone

8.3.21  12:42 pm   Do you read?

     yes

     If yes, what genre do you prefer?

      i can only think of 2 genres of reading, normal and artistic. and i like them both

8.3.21  10:56 am   how to create more time?

      decrease your program size

8.3.21  9:45 am   what's the past-tense of 'dive'. No cheating

      it was dived, but dove is probably legal by now also

8.3.21  8:55 am   How can you be so good at making music and songs?

      i'm gonna have to set some friendly limits on tangible parameters of the production process, if i really want to unlock the secret

8.3.21  8:48 am   are your baskets of ideas still multiplying?

      yes

8.3.21  8:13 am   how would u describe a bill wurtz type beat

      common sense

8.3.21  6:45 am   how many questions have you answered?

      i'd say at least a hand full

8.3.21  4:53 am   what do I do after a nightmare?

      tell the story of how things really are

8.3.21  2:42 am   Is it modest to call oneself as modest?

      secretly no

8.3.21  2:09 am   face reveal? 

      never

8.3.21  1:25 am   Help!! Boundless inspiration turned into boundless doubt when I wasn't looking. How to grow stronger?

      imagine for your upcoming birthday you can get some boundaries. take some time to dream up what kind of boundaries you think you might enjoy having

8.3.21  12:16 am   how do you keep yourself from worrying what everyone else thinks of you? I know I shouldn't do this so much, but it's so hard not to 

      you could start wondering what you think of them

8.3.21  12:05 am   Do you also get the feeling that what we do is just a pale reflection of what we could do, and 

      sometimes, but in that sense it's nice to have goals

8.2.21  10:48 pm   how did you get so good at singing?

      i haven't yet but it's on my to-do list

8.2.21  10:16 pm   Are change and sameness prominent themes in your works?

      yes
